ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: LFG, Anyone willing is welcome.
ygData.msgSnippet: The newbie server would be a good place for something like this I think.  I have a lvl 3 human freeport based monk there that I d want to use. Actually, I m
ygData.messageBody:
The newbie server would be a good place for something
like this I think. I have a lvl 3 human freeport
based monk there that I'd want to use.

Actually, I'm tired of my post 60 struggle with my
fenin ro monk, but read the news of exp changes and
soloing with interest. I'm also interested in the
news that some of the PoP zones are opening up based
on level instead of the stupid keys.

Anyone have opinions about where a 60+ monk can
reasonably solo? So far I've only tried my old sol b
stomping ground since the June 11 patch, but the exp
still sucks. Maybe chardok, or CT?

I'm an inch away from giving the game up and working
on my chess skills, so a way to breathe life back into
it would be great. I don't care that eq is a massive
multiplayer universe... I like to be able to solo dang
it.

Quwi Changkane, Grandmaster
Fenin Ro


--- hoggtyed <hoggtyed@...> wrote:
> Its just a friendly attempt to get to know people if
> your not
> interested thats cool. I am just looking for a few
> that are, But
> thnx for the reply.
> Hogg
>
>
>
>
>
